Quality Education.reason: This course aims to help students understand the interaction process... with digital media and introduces new HCI technologies.
evidence: This course aims to help students understand the interaction process between people and products through lectures and assignments, so they can understand how to design the best interaction experiences with digital media
The course consists of these units:

New HCI technologies, including the basic technologies of Metaverse such as Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI), and Artificial Intelligence (AI) and their impacts on future HCI development.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: References to new technologies and information architecture indicate innovation and infrastructure aspects.
evidence: New HCI technologies, including the basic technologies of Metaverse such as Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI), and Artificial Intelligence (AI) and their impacts on future HCI development.
Prototyping and evaluation of HCI design.
